description: I'm a software engineer based in Auckland. I graduated from the University of Auckland, earning myself a Bachelors of Software Engineering (First Class Honours) with a Senior Scholar Award. My honours project was on quantifying multitasking behaviour through digital logs and objective measurement. I am interested in full stack software engineering.
detailOrQuote: I am passionate about developing my skillset as a software engineering, gradually improving my craft with intention. I draw inspiration from not only my travels abroad, but aspects of my everyday life, focusing on improving with discipline and responsibility.
